des: "This is the perfect pick-me-up for a hot day, when you first wake up, or if you're staying up late."
ins: In a gallon pitcher or jar, combine the boiling water and tea bags. Let steep for about 1/2 hour, or until desired strength is achieved. Remove tea bags, and stir in honey to taste. Refrigerate until chilled, 3 to 4 hours. Stir in milk.
